name: SHAKER: An RPG by Brenda Brathwaite & Tom Hall (Canceled)
blurb: SHAKER: An Old School RPG is 1st-person, party-based, fantasy/sci-fi RPG brought to you by award-winning veterans.

rewards.reward: Early bird GAMER EDITION -- Welcome to the team! In addition to a full DIGITAL DOWNLOAD of the game on PC or Mac, you will gain exclusive access to the Old School RPG forums where you can contribute to its development, and we'll regularly thank you for giving us an opportunity to make an old-school RPG! Everyone who contributes receives an IN-GAME REWARD PACK with a unique CHARACTER HONOR and item.

GAMER EDITION -- Welcome to the team! In addition to a full DIGITAL DOWNLOAD of the game on PC or Mac, you will gain exclusive access to the Old School RPG forums where you can contribute to its development, and we'll regularly thank you for giving us an opportunity to make an old-school RPG! Everyone who contributes receives an IN-GAME REWARD PACK with a unique CHARACTER HONOR and item.

GAMER WITH EARS AND EYES EDITION -- All the previous rewards + a DOWNLOADABLE SOUNDTRACK of Old School RPG composed by award-winning sound designer and composer Dren McDonald. You'll also receive loot for your eyes - DIGITAL CONCEPT ART + DIGITAL WALLPAPERS + DIGITAL HIGH-DETAIL RENDERING OF THE GAME WORLD.

ADVENTURER EDITION -- All the previous rewards + EARLY BETA ACCESS + DIGITAL ADVENTURER'S GUIDE + A REALLY, SERIOUSLY OLD SCHOOL DIGITAL PEN-AND-PAPER EDITION of Old School RPG. The Adventurer's Guide contains useful information on the Old School RPG world, including character creation and development, NPC races, magic, combat, items and more. You'll also get a digital version of the Old School RPG pen & paper role playing system allowing you and your friends to spend some excellent time out of the dungeon and around the table.

BASIC BOX EDITION -- GAMER WITH EARS AND EYES EDITION + simple BOXED VERSION OF OLD SCHOOL RPG. The boxed copy will include a DVD version of the game and a printed manual. This is in addition to the digital version of the game (so 2 copies overall!). Please add $15 for international shipping.

OLD-SCHOOL EDITION -- All the previous rewards + a BOXED EDITION OF OLD SCHOOL RPG + CD CONTAINING THE OLD SCHOOL RPG AND SOUNDTRACK + EXCLUSIVE OLD SCHOOL RPG LOGO T-SHIRT + VIP IN-GAME CHARACTER HONOR + CUSTOM OLD SCHOOL RPG METAL MEDALLION. Harkening back to the golden era of RPGs, the Old School edition of Old School RPG comes complete with a classic RPG box which opens to reveal the Old School RPG t-shirt wrapping the game's CD and soundtrack. A classic trinket medallion completes the 1980's effect. Please add $15 for international shipping.

OLD-SCHOOL CLOTH MAP EDITION -- All the previous rewards + a BOXED EDITION OF OLD SCHOOL RPG + CLOTH MAP + CD CONTAINING THE OLD SCHOOL RPG AND SOUNDTRACK + EXCLUSIVE OLD SCHOOL RPG LOGO T-SHIRT  + VIP IN-GAME CHARACTER HONOR + CUSTOM OLD SCHOOL RPG METAL DOG TAG MEDALLION. Harkening back to the golden era of RPGs, the Old School edition of Old School RPG comes complete with a classic RPG box which opens to reveal the Old School RPG t-shirt wrapping the game's CD and soundtrack. A cloth map of the world and classic trinket medallion -- in this case, a Shaker Corporation dogtag -- completes the 1980's effect. Please add $15 for international shipping.

COLLECTOR'S EDITION -- All the previous rewards + COLLECTOR'S EDITION BOXED COPY OF OLD SCHOOL RPG SIGNED BY THE OLD SCHOOL RPG TEAM + OLD SCHOOL RPG CLOTH WORLD MAP + FULL-COLOR OLD SCHOOL RPG POSTER. For the RPG collector and connoisseur, the Collector's Edition comes signed by Tom Hall, Brenda Brathwaite and the rest of the development team. Old-school RPG players will also love the inclusion of a cloth world map, one of the great hallmarks of old-school RPGs! You will also receive a poster featuring a full rendering of the concept art piece that inspired the game. Please add $15 for international shipping.

ULTIMATE COLLECTION EDITION -- All the previous rewards + LIMITED EDITION PRINTED AND SIGNED OLD-SCHOOL RPG HARDCOVER BOOK containing PRINTED ADVENTURER'S GUIDE + the REALLY, SERIOUSLY OLD-SCHOOL PEN & PAPER RPG GAME + CONCEPT ART + TEAM INTERVIEWS + "MAKING OF" STORY AND PHOTOS + IN-GAME PLATINUM CHARACTER HONOR + IN-GAME LISTING IN OLD SCHOOL RPG CREDITS. As an ultimate collector, you'll get a unique, signed and limited-edition memento of the development of Old School RPG.  The printed book is more than just a keepsake, though. It contains a printed version of the Really, Seriously Old School RPG game system and two d10s for your gaming pleasure. Please add $15 for international shipping.

NAMED EDITION -- All the previous rewards + BECOME AN NPC, LOCATION OR ITEM + IN-GAME DIAMOND CHARACTER HONOR + IN-GAME LISTING IN OLD SCHOOL RPG "HALL OF HONOR" CREDITS. Become an NPC, item or entire location in Old School RPG. We promise, really, that we'll treat you nicely and not make you die a tragic and untimely death in a pool of fire or make you say or do embarrassing things (unless it's been your dream to say embarrassing things in an RPG). You'll also gain bragging rights and the ability to give away 10 DIGITAL COPIES OF OLD SCHOOL RPG to show off your cool character, location or item.

LIKE A BOSS EDITION -- All the previous rewards + BE AN OLD-SCHOOL RPG BOSS AND CHOOSE YOUR KILLING BLOW within reason, of course + SIGNED CONCEPT ART PRINT OF YOUR BOSS MONSTER + IN-GAME "BOSS" CHARACTER HONOR + IN-GAME LISTING IN OLD SCHOOL RPG "BOSS HALL OF FAME" CREDITS. Turn the tables on the RPG world and terrorize players as a BOSS in Old School RPG and receive a signed and printed rendering of your boss monster as designed by our lead concept artist. Because you're a boss you can demand 15 DIGITAL COPIES OF OLD SCHOOL RPG to show your friends just how amazing you are.

BAD-ASS PATRON EDITION -- All the previous rewards + ACCESS TO THE EXCLUSIVE OLD SCHOOL RPG LAUNCH EVENT + IN-GAME "PATRON" CHARACTER HONOR + IN-GAME LISTING IN "PATRON" CREDITS. At this level, we're eager and grateful for your contribution to Old School RPG, and know you must be as big a fan of the genre as we are. We look forward to hanging out with you for a day, playing games, talking design, planning for the next game, and finally culminating in the the Old School RPG launch party with the Old School RPG Team including Brenda Brathwaite, Tom Hall, and John Romero! You must cover your own transportation and lodging. You'll also get 20 DIGITAL COPIES OF OLD SCHOOL RPG to give away. All that in addition to BEING A BOSS + AN NPC/ITEM/LOCATION + all the amazing goodies in the ULTIMATE COLLECTION EDITION! Now that's what I call a PARTY PACK!

YOU REALLY ARE THE BOSS RED CARPET EDITION -- All the previous rewards + HAND DELIVERY OF THE "LIKE A BOSS" EDITION OF THE OLD SCHOOL RPG ON A RED VELVET PILLOW ON A RED CARPET. Really. At this level, we must thank you and express our gratitude in person for your amazing contribution to the development of Old School RPG and for allowing us to make the type of game that we and so many other players love.  Brenda Brathwaite, Tom Hall and John Romero will drive to your house (in the continental US only), roll a red carpet to your door and hand deliver the game on a red velvet pillow. You'll also get 25 DIGITAL COPIES OF OLD SCHOOL RPG to give away, an NPC/ITEM/LOCATION named after you, the ULTIMATE COLLECTION EDITION and the IN-PERSON VISIT. We'll even film it for you to remember.  You are a BOSS IN THE GAME and a BOSS OUTSIDE THE GAME!

YOU REALLY ARE THE BOSS INTERNATIONAL EDITION -- All the previous rewards + HAND DELIVERY OF THE "LIKE A BOSS" EDITION OF THE OLD SCHOOL RPG ON A RED VELVET PILLOW AT DISNEYLAND, ANAHEIM, CALIFORNIA. For our international patrons, Tom Hall, Brenda Brathwaite and John Romero will meet you at Disneyland in Anaheim, California and spend the day with you and two friends endlessly expressing our gratitude to you for allowing us to make the type of game we love to make. We'll cover your entry into the park, feed you churros until you're sick of them and even spring for a coveted and likely embarrassing (for us) photo on the ride of your choice. You are responsible for transportation and lodging. You'll also get 25 DIGITAL COPIES OF OLD SCHOOL RPG to give away, an NPC/ITEM/LOCATION named after you, the ULTIMATE COLLECTION EDITION and the IN-PERSON VISIT. We'll even film it for you to remember. You are a BOSS IN THE GAME and a BOSS OUTSIDE THE GAME!
